Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Gait
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Gait
Important Commands: crawl, creep, march, run, scuttle, skip, slither, stagger, stride, walk
Usually when you move you walk. However, you can also choose specific gaits like $(udat.chatchar)SLIDE and $(udat.chatchar)CREEP and $(udat.chatchar)MARCH. These gaits indicate both the speed of your movement and your emotional state.
You can use gaits to show your relationship with objects (proximities) in a room. For example: "$(udat.chatchar)stride to round table" or "$(udat.chatchar)slither under low table".
See Also: Movement, Proximity
